name: DDMinds
description:
We are a Washington, DC based IT Company providing a broad range of graphic design, website and mobile app design/development services. Our mission is to deliver outstanding results to our customers.
 
At DD Minds we are committed to adding value to your company by understanding your objectives, analyzing your current infrastructure and providing services that yield results.
 
Our approach is simple: Process driven • High quality • Strong communication • Strict on deadlines.
